timeline.bodyText: You could avoid to initialize a list here...
timeline.author: gsmet
gsmet

timeline.bodyText: Could you remove the SSE_ELEMENT_TYPE constant at the top of ResteasyCommonProcessor and only use the new one you created?
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText:
Ah. I totally missed the second one was not a else. Probably better to initialize that one to Collections.emptyList() then.
That way, you don't have to special case the null.
Sorry about that.
timeline.author: gsmet
